presentation.title: Full Stack Developer
presentation.description: I am a junior web developer eager to join the professional world. I enjoy continuously learning new technologies and deepening my knowledge of those I already know. I am proficient in both English and Spanish and thrive in collaborative team environments.

experience.heading: Experience
experience.title: Software Development
experience.description: During my internship, I acquired skills in full stack application development using Spring Boot and Angular. I implemented advanced methodologies such as Test-Driven Development (TDD) and hexagonal architecture. Additionally, I worked with modern technologies like Docker to optimize and manage development and deployment environments.

education.heading: Education
education.title: Web Application Development Degree
education.description: In this degree, I acquired skills in various languages and technologies, including Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot, PHP, and MySQL, among others. Additionally, I gained my first experience in team development and collaboratively managing projects with my colleagues.
